product_name: Wahoo Fitness TICKR Run Motion and Heart Rate Monitor
long_description: An all-in-one tool for runners, the Wahoo Fitness TICKR Run Motion and Heart Rate Monitor comes with all the same features as the original TICKR, plus powerful new features geared just toward runners.
short_description: An all-in-one tool for runners, the Wahoo Fitness TICKR Run Motion and Heart Rate Monitor comes with all the same features as the original TICKR, plus powerful new features geared just toward runners.
